attributes.action: Extend the London Underground to Tottenham Hotspur Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will allow the club to expand White Hart Lane, in turn helping to regenerate the local area.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Extend the London Underground to Tottenham Hotspur Football Club."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12927.asp

Prime Minister's Office
